AT.name: Zombie Defense
AT.description: Die Menschheit steht an der Schwelle zum Untergang da die Zombies erwacht sind und Tod und Verderben verbreiten. Du bist die letzte Hoffnung auf Erden! Wende klassische RTS/tower- defense Strategien in Zombie Defense für Wii U™ an, um die Zombie-Scharen aufzuhalten. Vereine die letzten Überlebenden, rüste sie aus und entwickle neue zerstörerische Technologien und beweise dich in zwei Spielmodi und 35 tödlichen Missionen. Besiege Wellen von Läufern, umherirrenden Monstern und Mutanten-Zombie-Bosse mithilfe von modernster Militärwaffentechnologie. Wird die Erde durch die Flut von Unheil untergehen oder wirst du zusammen mit den letzten Überlebenden die Erde retten können? Stürze dich ins tobende Chaos mit Zombie Defense dem Hit für Androide-Geräte, jetzt erhältlich im Nintendo eShop für Wii U™.

BG.name: Zombie Defense
BG.description: The dead burst forth from the earth, beneath a blackened sky an endless horde of zombies rampage across the burning corpse of our dying civilization. You are humanity's last hope! Use classic RTS/tower-defense strategies and tactics to decimate waves of zombie in Zombie Defense for Wii U™. Rally desperate soldiers, outfit them with lethal weaponry, innovate new destructive technologies and march to victory in two game modes and 35 deadly missions. Defeat waves of shambling walkers, creeping monstrosities and massive mutant zombie bosses as every weapon of the modern military arsenal is at your disposal. Earn money for your kills and upgrade to more effective weapons, vehicles and airstrikes, hire ruthless soldiers and develop killer technologies. Will Earth be overwhelmed by a shambling tide of filth, or will you and your desperate army of survivors prevail? Get into smashing mayhem with Zombie Defense, a super popular hit from Android, now available in the Nintendo eShop on Wii U™.

BE.name: Zombie Defense
BE.description: La mort surgit des profondeurs de la terre, sous un ciel noirci, une infinité de zombis se déchaînent sur le cadavre brûlant de notre civilisation mourante. Vous êtes le dernier espoir de l'humanité! Utilisez des stratégies de RTS/tower-defense pour décimer des vagues de zombis dans Zombie Defense sur Wii U™. Rassembler des soldats, des armes, de nouvelles technologies meurtrières et obtenez la victoire dans deux modes de jeu et 35 missions. Combattez des vagues de morts-vivants, de monstres et d'imposants boss zombis mutants avec tout l'arsenal militaire moderne à votre disposition. Les ennemis tués rapportent de l'argent permettant d'améliorer vos armes, vos véhicules des combat, vos technologies meurtrières et engagez de meilleurs assassins. La terre sera-t-elle gouvernée par une horde de morts-vivants ou par votre armée de survivants victorieux? Découvrez ce chaos sensationnel avec Zombie Defense, un énorme succès sur Android, maintenant disponible sur Wii U™ sur le Nintendo eShop.

ES.name: Zombie Defense
ES.description: La muerte brota sin cesar de la tierra. Bajo un cielo ennegrecido, una interminable horda de zombis arrasa a su paso con los restos de una civilización que agoniza. ¡Tú eres la última esperanza de la humanidad! Utiliza estrategias RTS / tower-defense en tiempo real para diezmar las oleadas de zombis en Zombie Defense para Wii U™. Recluta supervivientes, ármalos letalmente, innova con las nuevas tecnologías de destrucción y marcha hacia la victoria en los dos modos de juego y las 35 terroríficas misiones. Derrota las oleadas de zombis tambaleantes, monstruos terroríficos y mutantes, con todas las armas del moderno arsenal militar, vehículos y bombarderos que tienes a tu disposición. Recluta soldados despiadados y desarrolla nuevas tecnologías para matar. ¿Será la tierra devastada por una inmunda marea tambaleante, o prevaleceréis tú y tu desesperado ejército de supervivientes? Rompe el caos con Zombie Defense, el súper éxito de Android, ahora disponible en Nintendo eShop para Wii U™.

IT.name: Zombie Defense
IT.description: Sotto un cielo plumbeo i morti emergono dalla terra e un’orda di zombie è pronta a combattere per impossessarsi della nostra civiltà, ormai agli ultimi rantoli. Sei l’ultima speranza del genere umano! Usa strategie e tattiche RTS/Tower Defense per decimare queste tremende creature con Zombie Defense per Wii U™. Raduna i tuoi uomini e dotali di armi micidiali e di innovative tecnologie di distruzione e trionfa: hai a disposizione due modalità di gioco e 35 missioni letali per farlo! Annienta questa massa di biechi mostri dinoccolanti usando tutto l’arsenale di armi all’avanguardia di cui disponi. Ottieni ricompense per ciascuna vittima e potenzia le armi, i veicoli e la tua capacità di attacco aereo. Arruola soldati spietati e sviluppa tecnologie di distruzione. La terra sarà conquistata dal lerciume o il tuo esercito riuscirà nell’impresa? Combatti e semina il panico con Zombie Defense, l’hit di Android ora disponibile per Wii U™ sul Nintendo eShop.

NL.name: Zombie Defense
NL.description: De doden kruipen uit de aarde, de lucht is pikzwart. Een eindeloze horde zombies maakt amok in de smeulende overblijfselen van wat ooit onze beschaving was. Jij bent de laatste strohalm van de mensheid! Gebruik klassieke RTS/tower defensestrategieën en -tactieken om zombies te slachten in Zombie Defense voor Wii U™. Verzamel soldaten, geef hen dodelijke wapens, ontdek nieuwe oorlogstechnologieën en overwin de vijand in twee spelmodussen en 35 levensgevaarlijke missies. Sla alle aanvalsgolven van schuifelende zombies, kruipende creaturen en gigantische gemuteerde zombiebazen af. Alle wapens uit het moderne legerarsenaal staan tot je beschikking. Voor elke dode krijg je geld waarmee je wapens, voertuigen en luchtaanvallen kan upgraden, meedogenloze soldaten huren en aanvalstechnologieën ontwikkelen. Valt de wereld ten prooi aan de sloffende bende of haalt jouw wanhopige leger het? Maak brokken met Zombie Defense, een superhit van Android, nu verkrijgbaar in de Nintendo eShop op Wii U™.

PL.name: Zombie Defense

PT.name: Zombie Defense
PT.description: Os mortos irromperam a terra, sob um céu escurecido, uma horda interminável de zumbis devasta nossa civilização em extinção. Você é a última esperança da humanidade! Use estratégias e táticas clássicas de RTS/defesa de torre para dizimar multidões de zumbis em Zombie Defense para Wii U™. Reúna soldados desesperados, vista-os com armamento letal, inove novas tecnologias destrutivas e marche até à vitória em dois modos de jogo e 35 missões mortais. Derrote multidões de caminhantes, monstruosidades e bosses gigantes, dado que todas as armas do arsenal militar moderno estão à sua disposição. Ganhe dinheiro por suas mortes e melhore para armas, veículos e ataques aéreos mais eficazes, contrate soldados impiedosos e desenvolva tecnologias mortais. Será a Terra oprimida por uma maré de escuridão ou irá você e sua armada desesperada de sobreviventes prevalecer? Entre em um caos esmagador com Zombie Defense, um êxito super popular de Android, agora disponível na Nintendo eShop em Wii U™.

Earn money for your kills and upgrade to more effective weapons, vehicles and airstrikes, hire ruthless soldiers and develop killer technologies. Will Earth be overwhelmed by a shambling tide of filth, or will you and your desperate army of survivors prevail? Get into smashing mayhem with Zombie Defense, a super popular hit from Android, now available in the Nintendo eShop on Wii U™.

ZA.name: Zombie Defense
ZA.description: The dead burst forth from the earth, beneath a blackened sky an endless horde of zombies rampage across the burning corpse of our dying civilization. You are humanity's last hope! Use classic RTS/tower-defense strategies and tactics to decimate waves of zombie in Zombie Defense for Wii U™. Rally desperate soldiers, outfit them with lethal weaponry, innovate new destructive technologies and march to victory in two game modes and 35 deadly missions. Defeat waves of shambling walkers, creeping monstrosities and massive mutant zombie bosses as every weapon of the modern military arsenal is at your disposal. Earn money for your kills and upgrade to more effective weapons, vehicles and airstrikes, hire ruthless soldiers and develop killer technologies. Will Earth be overwhelmed by a shambling tide of filth, or will you and your desperate army of survivors prevail? Get into smashing mayhem with Zombie Defense, a super popular hit from Android, now available in the Nintendo eShop on Wii U™.
